title: Account
description: An account representing a user or actor in the Weltgewebe, typically anchored to a location (Garnrolle).

location.description: The internal, exact location (residence). Should NOT be exposed in public views if radius_m > 0.

public_pos.description: The calculated public position based on location and radius_m. This is the view-facing coordinate.

visibility.description: Controls the visibility of the account's location. 'public' shows exact coordinates (use with caution), 'private' hides them, 'approximate' shows a fuzzed location.

radius_m.description: Fuzziness radius in meters. If > 0, public_pos is randomized within this radius.

ron_flag.description: If true, the account is treated as a Role without Name (anonymized).
